spec_data.Name: gpm-static
spec_data.License: GPLv2 and GPLv2+ with exceptions and GPLv3+ and Verbatim and Copyright only
spec_data.Description:
The gpm-static package includes static libraries of gpm. The gpm provides
mouse support to text-based Linux applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 26 Feb 2017 11:48:13 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Static development files for the gpm library
